title: OCE Servers crashed again?
body: My client wont let me log on? anyone else having issues? :/

replies.body:
Hey there,

There were some issues around the time of you posting this, they should however be resolved now.

If you're still experiencing this problem please let me know.

yeah after i finished my game i couldnt re connect to chat and could see my end game screen in lobby either, cant log in now =/
login servers are down
I was logged in but then it kicked me and I can't get back in.
